name: Plane
description: Plane helps you track your issues, epics, and product roadmaps.

EMAIL_HOST.description: Email host to send emails from

EMAIL_HOST_USER.description: Email host to send emails from

EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD.description: Email host to send emails from

EMAIL_PORT.description: The default Email PORT to use

AWS_REGION.description: AWS Region to use for S3

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key ID to use for S3

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Access Key to use for S3

AWS_S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: AWS Bucket Name to use for S3

WEB_URL.description: Web URL for Plane this will be used for redirections in the emails
